Package notes

Class ProgrammingNote

java.lang.Object
notes.Note
notes.ProgrammingNote
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Reversable, Versionable
public class ProgrammingNote extends Note
Represents a programming note with programming language and coding snippet fields. This class extends the base Note class to provide specialized functionality for storing and managing programming-related notes including code snippets and language information.
Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgrammingNote

      public ProgrammingNote() throws TitleLengthExceededException
      Default constructor that creates a new ProgrammingNote with default values. Initializes the note with "Unknown language" and an empty coding snippet.
      Throws:
      TitleLengthExceededException - if the default title exceeds the maximum allowed length

    • ProgrammingNote

      public ProgrammingNote(String title, String description, String text, String author, Calendar date, Calendar deadline, String codingSnippet, String language) throws TitleLengthExceededException
      Constructs a new ProgrammingNote with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the programming note (must not exceed maximum length)
      description - a brief description of the programming note
      text - the main text content of the note
      author - the author who created this note
      date - the creation date of the note
      deadline - the deadline associated with this note (can be null if no deadline)
      codingSnippet - the code snippet to be stored in this note
      language - the programming language of the code snippet
      Throws:
      TitleLengthExceededException - if the title exceeds the maximum allowed length

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public ProgrammingNote clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException
      Creates and returns a deep copy of this ProgrammingNote. This method overrides the clone method from the parent Note class.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Note
      Returns:
      a new ProgrammingNote object that is a copy of this instance
      Throws:
      CloneNotSupportedException - if the object cannot be cloned

    • getLanguage

      public String getLanguage()
      Returns the programming language associated with this note.
      Returns:
      the programming language as a String (e.g., "Java", "Python", "C++")

    • setLanguage

      public void setLanguage(String language)
      Sets the programming language for this note.
      Parameters:
      language - the programming language to set (e.g., "Java", "Python", "C++") Can be null, though it's recommended to use "Unknown" instead

    • setCodingSnippet

      public void setCodingSnippet(String newSnippet)
      Sets the coding snippet for this programming note. This method allows updating the code content stored in the note.
      Parameters:
      newSnippet - the new code snippet to store in this note. Can be null or empty string for notes without code content.

    • getCodingSnippet

      public String getCodingSnippet()
      Returns the coding snippet stored in this programming note.
      Returns:
      the code snippet as a String, or empty string if no code is stored

    • setText

      public void setText(String text)
      Sets the main text content of this note. This method overrides the parent class method to provide direct access to the text field for programming notes.
      Overrides:
      setText in class Note
      Parameters:
      text - the main text content to set for this note

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this ProgrammingNote. The string includes all the information from the parent Note class plus the programming language and code snippet specific to this class.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Note
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing all note information including title, description, text, author, dates, language, and code snippet
